text: Yathā kho pana paccekapuṭṭhassa veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti evamevaṃ evarūpāya parisāya yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hoti
edit: Yathā kho pana paccekapuṭṭhassa veyyākaraṇaṃ hoti evamevaṃ evarūpāya parisāya yāvatatiyaṃ anusāvitaṃ hoti

translations.transtext: ก็การสวดประกาศให้ได้ยินมี กำหนด ๓ ในบริษัทเห็นปานนี้อย่างนี้ เป็นเหมือนถูกถามตอบเฉพาะองค์
Just as one who is questioned individually has an answer (ready), so too, (the Patimokkha) having been proclaimed three times in such an assembly (as this),
